short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension for Network Administrators to view their current stats for the month.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get access to your latest stats within a single click. The HitPath Extension for Chrome is ideal for Network Admins who need basic and up to the minute tracking without the fuss. We made it easy for you to cast a quick glance at your latest hits, conversions, sales, and more. When youâ€™re ready to dig deeper, you can log into your HitPath Admin straight from within the extension!

Optimize your business decisions with the HitPath Extension for Chrome.
